m_passive_skill_info.m_syllabary: かうんたーらいとにんぐ

passiveSkills.name: Lightning Counter
passiveSkills.desc: Unleashes lightning around you when you execute a Perfect Dodge or Perfect Guard.

advancedSkills.name: Thunder Pile
advancedSkills.desc: Shoots lightning in a straight line from the tip of your mace. Deals Electric damage and has a chance to stun.

advancedSkills.name: Heartbeat Breaker
advancedSkills.desc: A skillful barrage of mace attacks.

advancedSkills.name: Grand Forge
advancedSkills.desc: Crushes foes with a gigantic magic hammer. Party members within the area of the attack receive an Attack buff.

advancedSkills.name: God of Thunder
advancedSkills.desc: Violently slam your mace and call down lightning upon the enemy. Deals Electric damage and is guaranteed to stun.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Weapon Shot, unleashing 3 magic daggers.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Weapon Shot, unleashing 3 magic daggers.
